text:
Hello everyone,

- How do you succeed to avoid PDF ressources indexing by Google ? (ex : <https://cdn2.HubSpot.net/hubfs/3029743/IMAGES/VICTANIS/RESSOURCES/Market%20Review%20ENR/market-review-renewable-energy-June-2018.pdf?t=1531421176842>)
- How do you succeed to desindex PDF ressources that have already been indexed ?
Is there a recommended way to make child menu items drop down from the navbar on hover?
and make sure your menu is set to show flyouts and that it’s depth is set correctly or else the html won’t be formatted in a friendly way for styling
was the auto combination of css/js turned off?
noticing in my source that all my css files are minified but they are not combined

<@U6TBZ66FN> has previously told me that files are not combined if their tool detects a difference in the page when combined vs not combined. The tool can sometimes render a false positive in detecting a change, HS continuously retries to combine the files and usually when a false positive was detected in the past it will pass after multiple tries
it’s to prevent files from breaking other files
oh and this process in the past has been messed up when using a require on an asset that is not stored on HubSpot (stuff like cdnjs files)
seems like a basic question that I really can’t find the answer to anywhere on the HS site
I know Marketing Hub, Sales Hub, and Service Hub Pro and Enterprise do, but Starter and Free do not. Pro gets 300 workflows, Enterprise gets 500
thanks, figured out they called it “marketing automation” in their marketing materials. was kinda confusing
*Question* - What are the most commonly used HubSpot API's you use when building out a website???? :thinking_face::thinking_face::thinking_face:
right now, only really the blog API. Hoping for a modules API to come soon, that would be huge
